---
title: "`r info$Title`"
author:
 - name: "`r paste(info$Name, info$Surname)`"
   affiliation: [1]
   email: "`r info$Email`"
   contact: yes
 - name: "`r info$Authors`"
   affiliation: [2,3]
affiliation:
 - "`r a = info$Affiliation_for_authors; if (is.na(a)) NULL else a`"
keywords: "`r info$Keywords`"
packages: "`r p = info$R_packages_that_will_be_covered_in_presentation_poster; if (is.na(p)) NULL else p`"
# bibliography: bibliography.bib
output:  
        erum::erum_abstract:
                  keep_tex: TRUE
---
